message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product and I think you'd really enjoy it. I'm offering it to you for $175. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you meet me at that price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest but $120 is just a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $140.  What do you think?
I understand your position, but $140 is still a bit above my budget. Can you meet me at $130?
